description: Service for a particular household at a food pantry
title: Service

serviceId.description: [Output Only] Unique ID of pantry household service

transportationType.description: Type of transportation for the household

personPresentFirstName.description: First name of the person picking up the service items

headOfHouseholdGender.description: Gender of the Head of Household

isHomeless.description: Flag to indicate if a service was provided to a homeless household

isInCityLimits.description: Flag to indicate if a service was provided to a household in city limits

isSingleParentHousehold.description: Flag to indicate if a service was provided to a single parent household

disabledCount.description: Count of disabled household members receiving service

hispanicCount.description: Count of hispanic household members receiving service

specialNeedsCount.description: Count of special needs household members receiving service

genderMaleCount.description: Count of male gender household members receiving service

genderFemaleCount.description: Count of female gender household members receiving service

genderOtherCount.description: Count of other gender household members receiving service

numberPoundsFullService.description: Number of pounds of full service received

numberPoundsEFAP.description: Number of pounds of EFAP service received

numberPoundsSupplemental.description: Number of pounds of supplemental service received

numberPoundsNonFood.description: Number of pounds of non-food service received

numberPoundsBaby.description: Number of pounds of baby services received

numberPoundsOther.description: Number of pounds of other services received

createdAt.description: [Output only] Creation time of the user role

createdBy.description: [Output only] Creator of the user role

updatedAt.description: [Output only] Last modification time of the user role

updatedBy.description: [Output only] User to last modify the user role
